meanings.definition: In a joyful or celebratory manner
meanings.sent1: She smiled rejoicingly when she saw her friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: The children danced rejoicingly around the maypole.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail rejoicingly as it chased its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed rejoicingly under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered rejoicingly as the team scored the winning goal.

meanings.sent1: He hugged his grandmother rejoicingly after not seeing her for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The little girl skipped rejoicingly down the street with her new toy.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred rejoicingly as it curled up on its favorite cushion.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirped rejoicingly in the early morning light.
meanings.sent5: The baby giggled rejoicingly at the colorful balloons floating above.
